GeoKrety.org

Open source item tracking for all geocaching platforms

This is not the production instance. If you are not a tester, then you probably whish to go to our production website.
This branch 🥦 is actively developped 👨‍💻, if you find bugs 🐛, please check 👀 existing issues ♻️ on GitHub and feel free 🈚 to open new 🆕. (One 1 bug per issue please 🙏)
